ARABIC: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He used not to have iman in Allah the Magnificent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He did not believe in God the supreme,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He would not believe in Allah, the Most Great;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: they did not believe in the great God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed he refused to accept faith in Allah, the Greatest.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, he used not to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely he did not believe in Allah, the Great,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Behold, he never believed in God the All-mighty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! He used not to believe in Allah the Tremendous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: for he did not believe in Almighty God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily he was wont not to believe in Allah, the Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed he had no faith in Allah, the All-supreme,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This was he that would not believe in Allah Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, He used not to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He did not believe in Allah, the Great,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For he would not believe in God the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:33] Lo! he never believed in God the Tremendous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! he used not to believe in Allah the Tremendous) when he was in the life of the world,
